actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for cost-of-living adjustments in the individual tax rates, in the amount of the zero bracket amount, and in the amount of the personal exemptions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for cost of living adjustments in the individual income tax rates, in the amount of the zero bracket amount, and in the amount of the personal exemptions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for cost-of-living adjustments in the individual tax rates, in the amount of the zero bracket amount, and in the amount of the personal exemptions.
